TEXT.TITLE: SIOUX CITY CATTLE UP 0.50/1.00 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: slaughter cattle rose 0.50 to 1.00 dlr in active trade, the usda said. steers - choice 2-3 1100-1300 lbs 66.50-68.00. heifers - one load high dressing choice 3 near 1100 lbs 66.75. choice 2-4 975-1100 lbs 65.00-66.00. Reuter
